3. åº”ç”¨æ³¨å†Œç³»ç»Ÿ â€‹

// desktop/AppRegistry.tsx
export interface AppDefinition {
  id: string;
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description?: string;
  component?: React.ComponentType;
  type: 'window' | 'fullscreen' | 'iframe';
  defaultSize?: { width: number; height: number };
  url?: string; // for iframe
  requiredRoles: string[]; // æƒé™æ§åˆ¶
  category?: string; // åˆ†ç±»
}

export const appRegistry: AppDefinition[] = [
  // === å†…å®¹åº”ç”¨ ===
  {
    id: 'forum',
    name: 'è®ºå›',
    icon: 'ğŸ“',
    description: 'ç¤¾åŒºè®¨è®ºä¸å†…å®¹åˆ†äº«',
    component: ForumApp,
    type: 'window',
    defaultSize: { width: 1200, height: 800 },
    requiredRoles: ['User'],
    category: 'content'
  },
  {
    id: 'chat',
    name: 'èŠå¤©å®¤',
    icon: 'ğŸ’¬',
    description: 'å®æ—¶äº¤æµ',
    component: ChatApp,
    type: 'window',
    defaultSize: { width: 800, height: 600 },
    requiredRoles: ['User'],
    category: 'social'
  },
  {
    id: 'shop',
    name: 'å•†åŸ',
    icon: 'ğŸ›’',
    description: 'ç§¯åˆ†å•†åŸ',
    component: ShopApp,
    type: 'fullscreen', // å…¨å±ä½“éªŒæ›´å¥½
    requiredRoles: ['User'],
    category: 'commerce'
  },

  // === ç®¡ç†åº”ç”¨ ===
  {
    id: 'admin',
    name: 'åå°ç®¡ç†',
    icon: 'âš™ï¸',
    description: 'ç³»ç»Ÿç®¡ç†æ§åˆ¶å°',
    component: AdminApp,
    type: 'fullscreen',
    requiredRoles: ['Admin', 'System'],
    category: 'admin'
  },

  // === å·¥å…·åº”ç”¨ ===
  {
    id: 'docs',
    name: 'API æ–‡æ¡£',
    icon: 'ğŸ“„',
    description: 'Scalar API æ–‡æ¡£',
    type: 'iframe',
    url: 'https://localhost:5000/scalar',
    defaultSize: { width: 1400, height: 900 },
    requiredRoles: ['Developer', 'Admin'],
    category: 'tools'
  },

  // === ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹åº”ç”¨ï¼ˆç¤ºä¾‹ï¼‰ ===
  {
    id: 'game-example',
    name: 'å°æ¸¸æˆ',
    icon: 'ğŸ®',

];

3.2 æƒé™æ§åˆ¶ â€‹

æ¡Œé¢æ ¹æ®ç”¨æˆ·è§’è‰²è¿‡æ»¤å¯è§åº”ç”¨ï¼š

typescript
// desktop/Desktop.tsx
const Desktop = () => {
  const { user } = useAuth();

  // è¿‡æ»¤ç”¨æˆ·æœ‰æƒé™çš„åº”ç”¨
  const visibleApps = appRegistry.filter(app =>
    app.requiredRoles.some(role => user.roles?.includes(role))
  );

  return (
    <div className="desktop-grid">
      {visibleApps.map(app => (
        <AppIcon
          key={app.id}
          app={app}
          onDoubleClick={() => openApp(app.id)}
          onContextMenu={(e) => showContextMenu(e, app.id)}
        />
      ))}
    </div>
  );
};

4. çª—å£ç³»ç»Ÿ â€‹

4.1 çª—å£ç±»å‹ â€‹

ç±»å‹è¯´æ˜é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯
windowå¯æ‹–æ‹½ã€è°ƒæ•´å¤§å°çš„çª—å£è®ºå›ã€èŠå¤©å®¤ç­‰å°åº”ç”¨
fullscreenå…¨å±æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼Œéšè—æ¡Œé¢å•†åŸã€åå°ç®¡ç†ç­‰å¤æ‚åº”ç”¨
iframeåµŒå…¥å¤–éƒ¨ç½‘é¡µAPI æ–‡æ¡£ã€ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹å·¥å…·

4.2 çª—å£ç®¡ç†å™¨ â€‹

typescript
// desktop/WindowManager.tsx
export const WindowManager = () => {
  const { openWindows } = useWindowStore();

  return (
    <>
      {openWindows.map(window => {
        const app = appRegistry.find(a => a.id === window.appId);

        if (app.type === 'fullscreen') {
          return (
            <FullscreenApp
              key={window.id}
              onClose={() => closeWindow(window.id)}
            >
              <app.component />
            </FullscreenApp>
          );
        }

        return (
          <DesktopWindow
            key={window.id}
            title={app.name}
            icon={app.icon}
            defaultSize={app.defaultSize}
            onClose={() => closeWindow(window.id)}
            onMinimize={() => minimizeWindow(window.id)}
            zIndex={window.zIndex}
          >
            {app.type === 'iframe' ? (
              <iframe src={app.url} className="w-full h-full" />
            ) : (
              <app.component />
            )}
          </DesktopWindow>
        );
      })}
    </>
  );
};

4.3 çª—å£çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç† â€‹

typescript
// stores/windowStore.ts
interface Window {
  id: string;
  appId: string;
  zIndex: number;
  isMinimized: boolean;
  position?: { x: number; y: number };
  size?: { width: number; height: number };
}

export const useWindowStore = create<WindowStore>((set) => ({
  openWindows: [],

  openApp: (appId: string) => set(state => {
    // å¦‚æœå·²æ‰“å¼€ï¼Œèšç„¦çª—å£
    const existing = state.openWindows.find(w => w.appId === appId);
    if (existing) {
      return { openWindows: bringToFront(existing.id, state.openWindows) };
    }

    // åˆ›å»ºæ–°çª—å£
    const newWindow = {
      id: nanoid(),
      appId,
      zIndex: getMaxZIndex(state.openWindows) + 1,
      isMinimized: false
    };

    return { openWindows: [...state.openWindows, newWindow] };
  }),

  closeWindow: (windowId: string) => set(state => ({
    openWindows: state.openWindows.filter(w => w.id !== windowId)
  })),

  minimizeWindow: (windowId: string) => set(state => ({
    openWindows: state.openWindows.map(w =>
      w.id === windowId ? { ...w, isMinimized: true } : w
    )
  }))
}));

5. å­åº”ç”¨å¼€å‘ â€‹

5.1 è®ºå›åº”ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

typescript
// apps/forum/ForumApp.tsx
export const ForumApp = () => {
  return (
    <div className="forum-app h-full flex flex-col">
      <ForumHeader />
      <div className="flex-1 overflow-hidden">
        <Routes>
          <Route path="/" element={<PostList />} />
          <Route path="/post/:id" element={<PostDetail />} />
          <Route path="/create" element={<CreatePost />} />
          <Route path="/category/:id" element={<CategoryView />} />
        </Routes>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

// apps/forum/pages/PostList.tsx
const PostList = () => {
  const { data } = useQuery({
    queryKey: ['posts'],
    queryFn: () => api.getPosts()
  });

  return (
    <div className="post-list">
      {data?.items.map(post => (
        <PostCard key={post.id} post={post} />
      ))}
    </div>
  );
};

typescript
// apps/admin/AdminApp.tsx
import { Layout, Menu } from 'antd';

export const AdminApp = () => {
  return (
    <Layout className="h-full">
      <Layout.Sider>
        <Menu
          items={[
            { key: 'dashboard', icon: <DashboardOutlined />, label: 'ä»ªè¡¨ç›˜' },
            { key: 'apps', icon: <AppstoreOutlined />, label: 'åº”ç”¨ç®¡ç†' },
            { key: 'users', icon: <UserOutlined />, label: 'ç”¨æˆ·ç®¡ç†' },
            { key: 'roles', icon: <TeamOutlined />, label: 'è§’è‰²ç®¡ç†' }
          ]}
        />
      </Layout.Sider>
      <Layout.Content>
        <Routes>
          <Route path="/" element={<Dashboard />} />
          <Route path="/apps" element={<AppManagement />} />
          <Route path="/users" element={<UserManagement />} />
          <Route path="/roles" element={<RoleManagement />} />
        </Routes>
      </Layout.Content>
    </Layout>
  );
};

6. ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯é€‚é… â€‹

6.1 å“åº”å¼ç­–ç•¥ â€‹

typescript
// desktop/Shell.tsx
const Shell = () => {
  const isMobile = useMediaQuery('(max-width: 768px)');

  if (isMobile) {
    return <MobileShell />;
  }

  return <DesktopShell />;
};

6.2 ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯å¸ƒå±€ â€‹

ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯è‡ªåŠ¨è½¬æ¢ä¸º Tab å¯¼èˆªï¼š

â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”

â”‚ Tab: è®ºå›|èŠå¤©|å•†åŸ|æˆ‘  â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜

// desktop/MobileShell.tsx
const MobileShell = () => {
  const { user } = useAuth();
  const visibleApps = appRegistry.filter(app =>
    app.requiredRoles.some(role => user.roles?.includes(role))
  );

  return (
    <div className="mobile-shell">
      <StatusBar />
      <Routes>
        {visibleApps.map(app => (
          <Route
            key={app.id}
            path={`/${app.id}/*`}
            element={<app.component />}
          />
        ))}
      </Routes>
      <MobileTabBar apps={visibleApps} />
    </div>
  );
};
